entry.title: Operations: The Missing Django Piece
entry.content:
Description

In this talk, I‚Äôm going to demonstrate a new perspective on how to structure Django codebases using something I call ‚ÄúOperations‚Äù, so that Django codebases can scale well with any amount of features or complexity inside an application as it grows over time.
